upwards.translation[0].definitions[0].de: moving or pointing towards a higher position
upwards.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Pointing upwards, he indicated a large nest high in the tree.
The path began to climb steeply upwards.
upwards.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The expected rate of inflation was revised upwards.
upwards.translation[0].definitions[2].de: more than a particular amount, time etc
upwards.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The meeting was attended by upwards of (=over) 500 people.
